alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued October 03 at 5:34PM MST until October 03 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 533 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Randolph to Casa Grande to 12 miles west of Chui-Chu, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 184 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 147 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 143. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Arizola, Randolph, Stanfield and East Chui-Chu. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
